name: Dungeon Crawler Demo (unknown425)
description:
Dungeon Crawler 

WASD and Arrows keys to move

Use W, the space bar, or the Up arrow to Jump

X or L to dash (Unlocked after beating level 2)

Credit to  RGS_Dev for the Character Sprites (https://rgsdev.itch.io/  

https://opengameart.org/content/animated-knight-character-pack-v20)

Credit to  Orbitpanda for the Tile Set (https://orbitpanda.itch.io/)

Each Download file will come with the source code if you want to make changes without downloading it separately. 

Don't move any of the files as they are organized in a way to allow the game to run.

(MacOS Download is in the works)
